snippet.title: Parallel - Official Developer Trailer
snippet.description:
Add Parallel to your Steam wishlist
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1388350/Parallel/

Let's celebrate the advancement of Parallel and take the opportunity to play the demo that will be available from June 2nd to 20th on Steam Festival. I count on your support to publicize the project and leave your most sincere opinions here. So I can improve the project and bring a good game to everyone in the second half of this year.

And to stay tunned, don't forget to include your e-mail at the newsletter on the Official game Website
https://www.parallel-game.com

In October I will be at BGS 2022, come to see me.
https://www.brasilgameshow.com.br/

Thank you to everyone who follows me and cheers for the success of the game.
